website_summaries.verdict: Bronze your skin and add a pop of color to your cheeks with this convenient duo available in two classic combinations.
pros: Choose between the Orgasm/Laguna duo (light to medium skin) or Sin/Casino duo (medium to deep skin)
Powder texture is smooth and blendable on both blush and bronzer
Both have a shimmer finish for radiant cheeks
cons: Some users report having to build up the blush quite a bit to get to their desired color

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! The description says full size, but I ...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! The description says full size, but I received a small, travel size. Completely inaccurate website description. Such a pain and so dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I love the combo of the two. Much easier to carry than separate items. I am light skinned and these colors work fantastically for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best, sophisticated bronzer and blush for all people.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for everyone! Light, but still colorful, blush, and the bronzer is just right. Easy to access and sleek, lightweight container, and I like that it has a mirror. This duo is especially great for aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: connie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with gold shimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great! So great someone stole it from me while getting ready with other bridesmaids . It was lighter than I expected but for light skinned neutral look it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: karatemomma

customer_reviews.title: Pefect Combination
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after watching an episode of What Not To Wear on TLC. I love their makeup artist Carmindy and she always has great suggestions. This product is good for all lighter skin tones. I put a bit of the bronzer (Laguna) around my outer forehead and my upper cheekbone and then brush the blush (orgasm) on my entire cheekbone in a sweeping motion and it just gives a slight glow without going overboard. It looks like you were kissed by the sun! And that's good as I have a light complexion. Use in conjunction with Benefit's High Beam on the upper cheekbone and eyebrow ridge for a lovely glow all year round!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Aultman

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I use NARS I have worked for them in the past. I bought this to add to my makeup kit that I use on clients. The blush is orgasm, which is probably the most popular selling blush in the world. Yes, I LOVE the blush. The highlighter is okay. I'm not crazy about it. It's def a yellow gold so pale rosy complexions are not a good fit for this highlighter. It's nice, it blends well....but it's shimmery and not universally accepted.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy kern

customer_reviews.title: Nars Bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Ordered it through Amazon Prime because of the fast shipping. Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Susieduq

customer_reviews.title: A MUST Have
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was apprehensive about trying out this duo because I have very porcelain skin and thought it might be too dark or clownish looking. I was pleasantly surprised how the color looked so natural on my skin. Laguna is an excellent shade of bronzer and is also great for contouring. Orgasm pairs beautifully with laguna and is probably the best blush I've ever used. It gives a radiant glow and touch of color without being too overdone. This is definetly a must-have product, one that I can't imagine being without now. Well worth the money and love the free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great blush-bronzer duo
customer_reviews.text: The color combo is perfect - every bronzer needs a little brightener at times and the Orgasm color goes perfectly with the bronzer. I feel professionally made up when I wear these tones
customer_reviews.author: Rahaf

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: The product was a little lighter in color than I would have liked. It would look better on pale skin.
customer_reviews.author: Spirited Lady

customer_reviews.title: Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I love Nars blush/bronzer. And it lasts! I used it everyday for 3 years, and now it's almost gone, so I will reorder it. The orgasm/laguna is perfect for creating a healthy glow. I use the bronzer color all over and the pink on my cheeks (sometimes eyelids too).
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great Bronzer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Orgasm/Laguna Duo. I very much love the Laguna Bronzer but find myself not evening needing the Orgasm blush. I do very much prefer the Cargo Bronzers, but this was equally good as well. Lasting Power: 4-6 Hours (Without Primer) Color: Not Orange! Gives you a tanned/bronzed healthy appearance How long does the powder last? I've been using it everyday since September 2011..so a long time!
customer_reviews.author: HonestReview

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Very natural and perfect for everyday use. goes on very easy and weightless. love it. perfect combo for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaSun21

customer_reviews.title: Too little Bronzer, too much blush!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I heard great reviews on it. I personally loved the pigments in both and highly recommend both products! However I was out of the bronzer within about 2 months of using the product, and I still have a significant amount of blush left. I would definitely get the bronzer separately in the bigger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Rozsnyai

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only blush/bronzer I use everyday. I love the Laguna bronzer, I've had it since last summer and I still haven't hit pan. You din't need much just a couple of strokes on the cheek and instantly makes the face look slim!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, came on time and in tact. Applies flawlessly and really pretty colors. I'm glad I made this purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: MTracy

customer_reviews.title: The smaller size of both colors is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: A little 'Orgasm' goes a long way. The smaller size of both colors is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Bemis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Best combo EVER! gorgeous colour, application is smooth and shimmer is not too obvious. I'm not surprised this compact keeps smashing the review charts! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Youbledub

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!!! I love makeup but have always struggled with contour and blush! This is the best. Laguna is the perfect shade of brown and Orgasm is the perfect blush. If you are thinking of getting this--- just DO IT!!
customer_reviews.author: L13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! I was so glad when it came as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Linderbaum

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Hungry Heart blush NARS product and I absolutely love it! The blush duo colors were exactly how I thought it was going to be and looks just like the picture posted. Also, the shipping was faster than I expected, which was awesome -- it only took about 3 days! I have been looking for this specific product for awhile and I'm so pleased with it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Pretty expensive, nothing special, I'll try and use it up but would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Be careful!!! I received a travel size not full size for my order.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Maher

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Colors are great and it's long-lasting. I told all my friends about it but it turns out they all already use it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Weems

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Glow
customer_reviews.text: The Albatross and Orgasm duo gives you a flawless glow, its so gorgeous! I apply the Albatross on the bridge of my nose & cheek bones which gives my face good definition and a golden glow. The Orgasm blush is the perfect shade, not too dark but not too light, with just enough sparkle. The duo is a good deal, the well's are larger than I expected and a little goes a lot way especially with the Albatross. Nars products are expensive so the duo's really are a good idea because you can experience more than one product at once. This really is an A+ product that I will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Not full sized as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the product description clearly indicates that this is supposed to be a full sized, 10.5 grams product, it was not full sized. The product shipped was actually only 5 grams, the travel size. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing this. I bought it based on reviews. It's everything people said it was. Love the color and the subtle glitter
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: What I was looking for and it came in the time the seller said it would. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joaniecp

customer_reviews.title: NARS Bronzing Blush Duo
customer_reviews.text: Love NARS Orgasm blush & have been using it since discovering it several years ago. The bronzer in this duo is a little too brown for my skintone. I'll stick with Neutrogena's Healthy Skin Custom Glow Blush & Bronzer in Natural Glow, and then top off with a light dusting of NARS' Orgasm. NARS' Orgasm really is the most beatiful blush on the market...& works perfectly with every skintone.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: I have very pale skin and this shows up pretty much as just sparkles
customer_reviews.text: Okay application but the pigments are VERY light. I have very pale skin and this shows up pretty much as just sparkles :/ I still love that affect, and it does make a nice finishing blush over makeup, BUT I was disappointed the colors are so off.
customer_reviews.author: Seeair

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT COLORS YEAR AROUND!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this months ago and am STILL using the blush part-have already gone through the bronzer! Perfect colors for all occasions-you can glam it up for the night life, or wear it daily for a natural look. Nothing clown-like about it and excellent quality as can be expected with the NARS brand. Slightly spendy, but worth EVERY penny
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Must!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. The white really makes a face Brighten up a lot. I love the pink color also. Both colors really work Great together. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DAVIS93

customer_reviews.title: you'll be pleased with the blending capabilities with the Laguna bronzer
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of the Orgasm blush, you'll be pleased with the blending capabilities with the Laguna bronzer. Such a great pairing for easy contouring.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Still the best bronzer/blush I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Still the best bronzer/blush I've ever used. Applies the right amount of color and distributes evenly. Love the subtly of color and the quality of the makeup. Will never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great sheer natural color
customer_reviews.text: Color looks natural but has a little sparkle for the cheek color. The bronzer is very sheer and also looks natural. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Gives just the right shimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Use it sparingly and my skin glows beautifully. More late afternoon and evening look or dressy. Product lasts a long time and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Rosenwasser

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great blush combo. I'm a redhead and this combination works perfectly for my color pallette. Blush stays on throughout the day. I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Both the orgasm blush and laguna bronzer are great. However
customer_reviews.text: Both the orgasm blush and laguna bronzer are great. However, these are fairly small quantities and I think price wise it is worth it to buy one container of each instead of just the combo. Additionally, since I personally use bronzer all over my face and swipe a little on my neck and collar bones, but just put blush on the apples of my cheeks, I used up all the bronzer while only about 1/3 of my way through the blush - so again, I will just buy individual containers of each in the future.
customer_reviews.author: uneanthropologiste

customer_reviews.title: peachy
customer_reviews.text: This blush can't be beat. I love this duo. The bronzer is easy to use under check bone to show definition. The orgasm blush is peach with gold flakes it is beautiful and works with all warm colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Best Blush DUO ever!
customer_reviews.text: It's the third time that I'm buying this product and it's still the best! Love it because it suits very well with my skin tone. Love the peachy Orgasm
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda S. Thome

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the make up arrived broken as soon as I notified them everything was taken care of on the same day, such a great shopping experience and they care about their customers! Thank you guys so much I love my make up! It looks fantastic on :) I'm very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Classic Duo
customer_reviews.text: Great blush and highlighter duo, by far the best I've ever tried. So happy to have it in my collection!
customer_reviews.author: kvan

customer_reviews.title: PRICE IS AS IF THE BIGGER SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal!! The product does not quote that its the MINI size & they charge double price should be no more than $24 CAREFUL
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Product is great.  It is just very very very light.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a eyeshadow base. I am very disappointed with it as a blush. It is way too light.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong Color So I had to return it to get my money back from Amazon were I have an open account.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Hinterberger

product_meta.title: NARS Blush Bronzer Duo, Orgasm / Laguna Full Size 10.5 grams / 3.5 ounces
product_meta.description: Color:Orgasm / LagunaFeaturing covetable color combinations, each Blush Duo features blush hues that are unanimously touted for their universally flattering and natural-looking color. When combined with versatile bronzing powders or highlighting powder, all compacts impart quintessential glow with ease and convenience for all skin tones. The blushes paired with bronzing powders are the ultimate tool for achieving a sun-kissed look with a hint of naturally radiant color for a believable year-round glow, while those paired with Albatross create highlights and add dimension and radiance. Limited Availability.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
